languages.text: "Разрозненные данные, сложившиеся в единую картину. Вдобавок некоторое время назад на Футфол прибыло судно с этого мира. Донесения, полученные от экипажа, путанные и тревожные — и наводят на мысль о восстании планетарного масштаба".

traits.locale_text: "Разрозненные данные, сложившиеся в единую картину. Вдобавок некоторое время назад на Футфол прибыло судно с этого мира. Донесения, полученные от экипажа, путанные и тревожные — и наводят на мысль о восстании планетарного масштаба".

languages.text: "Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."
languages.original_text: "Разрозненные данные, сложившиеся в единую картину. Вдобавок некоторое время назад на Футфол прибыло судно с этого мира. Донесения, полученные от экипажа, путанные и тревожные — и наводят на мысль о восстании планетарного масштаба".

traits.locale_text: "Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived at Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me think of a rebellion on a planetary scale."

"Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived at Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me think of a rebellion on a planetary scale."

"Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

"Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

"Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

languages.text: «Teníamos retazos sueltos de datos que por fin han formado una imagen coherente. Por si fuera poco, una nave proveniente de ese mundo llegó a Paso. Los informes de la tripulación eran confusos y alarmantes, lo que me hizo temer una rebelión a escala planetaria».
languages.original_text: "Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

traits.locale_text: «Teníamos retazos sueltos de datos que por fin han formado una imagen coherente. Por si fuera poco, una nave proveniente de ese mundo llegó a Paso. Los informes de la tripulación eran confusos y alarmantes, lo que me hizo temer una rebelión a escala planetaria».

languages.text: “零零散散的碎片，最终拼成了完整的拼图。不仅如此，不久前，有一艘舰船从那边抵达了落脚港。船员报告的内容非常混乱，而且令人震惊。我不禁担心，可能会发生整颗行星规模的叛乱。”
languages.original_text: "Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

traits.locale_text: “零零散散的碎片，最终拼成了完整的拼图。不仅如此，不久前，有一艘舰船从那边抵达了落脚港。船员报告的内容非常混乱，而且令人震惊。我不禁担心，可能会发生整颗行星规模的叛乱。”

languages.text: 「バラバラのデータの欠片がついに1つにまとまりましたよ。その上つい最近、あの惑星から来た船がフットフォールに到着したんです。クルーからの報告は明確ではなく不安になる内容で、惑星規模の反乱が起きるのではと恐ろしく思っているのです」
languages.original_text: "Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

traits.locale_text: 「バラバラのデータの欠片がついに1つにまとまりましたよ。その上つい最近、あの惑星から来た船がフットフォールに到着したんです。クルーからの報告は明確ではなく不安になる内容で、惑星規模の反乱が起きるのではと恐ろしく思っているのです」

languages.text: "Unzusammenhängende Datenfragmente, die endlich ein Gesamtbild ergeben. Außerdem ist vor nicht allzu langer Zeit ein Schiff aus dieser Welt auf Footfall eingetroffen. Die Berichte der Besatzung waren wirr und alarmierend. Ich befürchte eine planetenweite Rebellion."
languages.original_text: "Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

traits.locale_text: "Unzusammenhängende Datenfragmente, die endlich ein Gesamtbild ergeben. Außerdem ist vor nicht allzu langer Zeit ein Schiff aus dieser Welt auf Footfall eingetroffen. Die Berichte der Besatzung waren wirr und alarmierend. Ich befürchte eine planetenweite Rebellion."

languages.text: « À cause de bribes de données décousues qui se sont enfin rassemblées pour former une image complète. En outre, un vaisseau de ce monde est arrivé sur Castel il y a peu. Les rapports de l'équipage étaient confus et alarmants, ce qui me fait craindre une rébellion à l'échelle de la planète. »
languages.original_text: "Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

traits.locale_text: « À cause de bribes de données décousues qui se sont enfin rassemblées pour former une image complète. En outre, un vaisseau de ce monde est arrivé sur Castel il y a peu. Les rapports de l'équipage étaient confus et alarmants, ce qui me fait craindre une rébellion à l'échelle de la planète. »

languages.text: "Birbirinden bağımsız veri parçaları nihayetinde bir araya gelerek büyük resmi gösterdi. Ayrıca kısa süre önce oradan yola çıkan bir gemi Binliman'a ulaştı. Mürettebatın verdiği raporlar karman çorman ve düşündürücüydü. Gezegenin tamamına yayılmış bir ayaklanmadan endişeleniyorum."
languages.original_text: "Disjointed pieces of data that finally merged into a single picture. Additionally, not long ago a vessel from that world arrived on Footfall. The reports from the crew were confused and alarming, making me fear a planet-wide rebellion."

traits.locale_text: "Birbirinden bağımsız veri parçaları nihayetinde bir araya gelerek büyük resmi gösterdi. Ayrıca kısa süre önce oradan yola çıkan bir gemi Binliman'a ulaştı. Mürettebatın verdiği raporlar karman çormandı ve düşündürücüydü, gezegenin tamamına yayılmış bir ayaklanma çıkmış olmasından endişeleniyorum."
